Title: Steal the Donut Recipe
Description: Your first mission: infiltrate the corporate bakery server and grab their secret donut recipe.

Choices.Option: Use social engineering to trick the admin.
Choices.SuccessText: You successfully tricked the admin and got the recipe!
Choices.FailText: The admin caught on. Mission failed.

Choices.SuccessText: You cracked the password! Recipe acquired.
Choices.FailText: Too many attempts! You triggered an alert.

Title: Leak Corporate Secrets
